task.task: Do a set of 10-15 push-ups to strengthen your chest, shoulders, and triceps.
Stand facing a wall and perform push-ups against it to engage your chest, shoulders, and arms.
While standing, lift your heels off the ground and hold for a few seconds to work your calf muscles.
Bend one knee at a time to curl your leg backward and engage your hamstrings.
Extend your arms out to your sides and perform small circles to work your shoulders and upper arms.
